name: Kindling Krusader
description:
Kindling Krusader is a 3D dungeon crawler where you play as an intrepid chandelier as he makes his way out of a dark dungeon full of ashen foes. Pick your weapons, special abilities, and upgrades as you fight enemies and solve puzzles!

 

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Space or M1 - Attack
  • Tab - Active Ability
  • Esc - Pause

 

Team:

  • Engineering & Systems Design - Andrew Obeso
  • Art & Level Design - Michelle Liu
  • Music Composition - Elijah Green, Zhengzheng Fan
  • Sound Design - Colin Curtin
  • Audio Production - Sergio Maldonado
